query.query1_AppIO: SELECT * from POSITION_ACTIVATE WHERE CREDITOR_REFERENCE_ID  = '$activateIOPaymentResponse.creditorReferenceId' AND PA_FISCAL_CODE = '$activateIOPaymentResponse.fiscalCodePA' AND PAYMENT_TOKEN = '$activateIOPaymentResponse.paymentToken'
query.query_config: UPDATE NODO4_CFG.CONFIGURATION_KEYS s SET s.CONFIG_VALUE = '?1' WHERE s.CONFIG_KEY = '?2'
